lead_paragraph: Hashim Amla said on Wednesday he was stepping aside as South Africa’s test captain with immediate effect, a day after a double century rescued his country from possible defeat in the second test against England.

headline.print_headline: Amla Quits as South Africa Captain
headline.main: Amla Quits as South Africa Captain

snippet: Hashim Amla said on Wednesday he was stepping aside as South Africa’s test captain with immediate effect, a day after a double century rescued his country from possible defeat in the second test against England....
